name: k8s-cloud-app
description: This is a sample Python web based application intended to be used for Kubernetes practice and testing in preparation for the CKA / CKAD examinations.

scripts.devel: concurrently "nodemon node index.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -c -t='sys:yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss TT' -S" "cd ../frontend && npm start"
scripts.start: node index.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -c -t='sys:yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss TT' -S

author: Jason Hanks <jason.e.hanks@gmail.com>
